name: Raspberry Pi Pico

UniversalLedControl.description: Universal LED control with common protocol (GPIO pin 25)

LEDBlink.description: Basic LED blink for write/upload testing (GPIO pin 25)

SerialLedControl.description: Serial-controlled LED for digital GPIO pin 25
SerialLedControl.deprecationReason: Use UniversalLedControl for common protocol compatibility

notes: Uses built-in GPIO LED on pin 25. Simple on/off control only.
